title: Why was a helicopter flying near Figure 8 island Wednesday night around 9pm with its search lights on?
text:
The New Hanover County SheriffÍs Air One helicopter was dispatched
around Figure 8 Island to assist in a search for a missing kayaker,
according to Cpl. J.J. Brewer of the New Hanover County SheriffÍs
Office. The kayaker was located near the Figure 8 bridge and the
helicopter remained with him until the Coast Guard got there.  



BoatswainÍs mate first class Andrew Babione with the United States
Coast Guard Wrightsville Beach said the guard launched a vessel and
guided the kayaker back to the Wildlife Resource CommissionÍs boat
ramp near the Wrightsville Beach drawbridge. He was not injured.
